title: LFT Bronze II  Support/ADC main
body:
Hello Everyone 
I am bronze II looking to join a bronze team, although i'm not the best player I am looking for a team that is chill and help me learn a bit more about how to play!! add me if u would like to give me a hand thanks!!

replies.body: Hey!! I'm in bronze and would be keen to play! looking for good people to team up with.
Bronze II here. I mainly play Support but I can top as well :)
if youre looking for a ranked team to learn some stuff im gold 1 and happy to give a little advice
Hey mate, im Bronze 1, i'm more than happy to duo, i main adc/jg but i don't mind where i play, just looking for someone to play ranked with :)
Would you be interested in duo queue?
Your gold bro we wont be able to. But if you have a smurf im more than happy to.
